body:
Hey guys,
I am leaving for 3 weeks, bc I am in Italy!
I can't play scrims at these weeks and that is the reason why I post this. If u need me for something u always can add me on skype or place something below here in the discussion.
I also did some applies, but I can't play any scrims.
I am online in my phone at the forums. So don't worry there is something if u thought there was! ;)

Goodbye in 3 weeks and cya soon! :)

title: Leaving for 3 weeks
